divs: sighting detailsas i was filming some planes that day, nothing really seemed unusual. i was in "trier - germany" on the parking of a supermarket. but as i was watching the material at home , in one video , i was surprised seeing 4 or 5 white dots crossing the screen. my first impression was that my camera caused those dots, but as i watched the about 40minutes footage , hey never appeared again. after watching the video several times, i seems to me , that those "dots" where in the sky , fyling. so they dont seem to be reflections , because 1. i never had them in my videos ever before. 2. the sun was in the other direction. 3. one object seems to dissapear in the cloud , and in the next frame it reappears behind the cloud. i cannot say that those are aircrafts , because they must have been faster than any aircraft i would know. the only aircrafts which im concerned of , would be some like the black bird. but the black bird is black , and i would have heard it. i have one frame , showing a clear picture of a disc shaped metallic looking object which i isolated in my videos. i was pretty surprised when i watched the footage. here are the videos: *(three links moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). i hope to get your interpretations of them. thank you with friendly greetings.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Trier
This sighting has never been favorited.
